title: Bug 102516 - JDBC Data Set Editor should load tables and columns on demand
description: Bug 102516 - JDBC Data Set Editor should load tables and columns on demand. The JDBC Data Set Editor page for a SQL Query has a tree control that lists the tables and columns in your data source.
OB: Currently, when the data set editor is opened, the entire schema is queried and all tables and columns are loaded at once.
EB: Instead, the data set editor should load tables and columns on demand, so that the user doesn't have to wait for the entire schema to be queried.
SR: Implement the ability to filter tables and columns based on schema in the data set editor, as requested in bug 101372.
